pos review: Huge room, incredible view of the town centre
neg review: The room was hot, but a bit of a heat wave was going on at the time.

pos review: Living like in a museum Great location Underground parking 200 m away Authentic furniture
Our room was really clean, big and cosy. We loved the view from our terrasse.

Beautiful and comfortable room. The hotel room exceeded my expectation! I felt like a queen in this spacious room which had beautiful paintings and huge Belgian lace in a glass frame.  Great view of the Grote Markt and had a good view of the parade and festivities in the square.  I loved the Belgian Waffle served in the hotel for breakfast!
What's not to like about an old elite apartment overlooking the city square !!
